newsitem.title: USA: Corporate Express Inc makes acquisitions.
newsitem.headline: Corporate Express Inc makes acquisitions.

text.p: Corporate Express Inc said on Friday it had completed 13 acquisitions with combined revenues of more than $100 million for a total consideration of $24.7 million, including assumed debt.
Corporate Express said it had acquired Katro and Asite SpA, two Italian contract stationers, which are to be consolidated into a new distribution center in Milan.
Of the 11 other acquisitions, two unnamed contract stationers were in Germany and the rest were in North America, it said.
Corporate Express is a supplier of non-production goods and services to large corporations.
